forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High near 5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High near 40F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Mostly cloudy late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain...becoming light overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and freezing rain...becoming light overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 40%.
